Article1: Forecasts will consist in predicting the final result of each match of the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar. Regarding predictions, as from the round of 16, forecasts will be about the first 90 minutes of play. Extra time or penalty shoot-outs will not be taken into account.

Article2.4: At the end of the World Cup, extra forecasts will be awarded points for

Article3: If two or more forecasters tie with each other, exact result correct guesses will be taken into consideration to have a winner.
Article4: Prizes will be given for first, second and third places at the end of the World Cup.
Article5: Forecasts can be submitted up to 24 hours prior to each match. After this deadline, players will not be allowed to make changes to their predictions.
Article6: Only Baufest employees are allowed to participate in this competition.
